name: Megumin Bakuen edition
description:
1.0a is harder to control than 0.6t, but can more and do sharper results average without img2img or hiresfix.

use 0.6t if you want stable results on easy scenes.

Bakuen/konosuba models will be updated later

and i think i made result LoRa's page after it's finished/or get close to it

Works fine with anime models like andromedaMix or grapefruit or https://civitai.com/models/4669/corneos-7th-heaven-mix

strength 0.6-0.8, hiresfix or img2img for best results(it's works for every LoRa).

Train models isn't easy, crypto donations on some coffee are welcome:

https://plisio.net/donate/pm9qVYci

modelVersions.name: v1.0a
modelVersions.description:
little updated Megumin/bakuen model, i will do many fixes in next 10days about it, but it's possible to use and get different styles from anime with it at now too.

0.6t model easier to control at now. 1.0a harder to use and need more precisious prompt->if you want just easy scene or something like it use 0.6t.

strength 0.6-0.8, hiresfix or img2img for best results(it's works for every LoRa).

if you get bad results - try https://civitai.com/models/4669/corneos-7th-heaven-mix this checkpoint and write in prompt position(like "front view, face"), because dataset not only front-face.

Train models isn't easy, crypto donations on some coffee are welcome:

https://plisio.net/donate/pm9qVYci
